content: Rename constants and generalize error detection (COMPONENT_ERROR_CODE -> TYPE_FORMAT_ERROR_CODE, etc)
Add resource methods to FORMAT_DISCOVERY_METHODS constant
Create ParameterLocation enum and get_parameter_location function
Create extract_type_items function to handle all parameter locations
Create apply_corrections function to reconstruct params
Replace attempt_components_format_discovery and attempt_value_format_discovery with unified attempt_format_discovery
Update ErrorPattern enum to include TupleStructAccess
Implement fix_tuple_struct_path for handling tuple struct access errors
Update debug messages and documentation to use 'type' instead of 'component'
Update analyze_error_pattern to detect tuple struct errors
